mapper.sql: id, user_id, video_sp_start, video_sp_end, code_sp_start, code_sp_end, note, study_question, class_question, remark, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_sp (id, user_id, video_sp_start, video_sp_end, code_sp_start, code_sp_end, note, study_question, class_question, remark, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoSpStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoSpEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codeSpStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codeSpEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studyQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_sp
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_sp_start = #{videoSpStart,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_sp_end = #{videoSpEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code_sp_start = #{codeSpStart,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code_sp_end = #{codeSpEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
study_question = #{studyQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_question = #{classQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_sp set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_sp_start = #{videoSpStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_sp_end = #{videoSpEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code_sp_start = #{codeSpStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code_sp_end = #{codeSpEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, study_question = #{studyQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_question = #{classQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM (select count(*)as grp from t_user group by group_id) t

select q.question,question_state,c.end_time FROM t_conference_questions q,t_conference c where c.id=q.conference_id AND c.rank_id=2 and group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND DATE(c.end_time)=#{updateTime}
select q.question,question_state,c.end_time FROM t_conference_questions q,t_conference c where c.id=q.conference_id AND c.rank_id=1 AND DATE(c.end_time)=#{updateTime}
